attributes.action: The 21 bishops of the Church of England sitting as unelected Lords Spiritual in the House of Lords should be not be automatic and at fixed number
attributes.additional_details: Other religious groups like Church of Scotland & Board of Deputies of British Jews are not entitled to sit as Lords Spiritual. Britain is a secular society with followers of many faiths or no faith (like agnostics or atheists). Apart from followers of a religion, there are many who believe that many phenomena can be scientifically explained, proved & verified, using knowledge available today without having to invoke explanations that involve the spiritual world.  In a way, invoking the name of God on complex issues can hinder the seeking of explanations & solutions from a scientific & logical standpoint to pressing problems. Scientific knowledge demands concrete proof & evidence and is open to exhaustive peer reviews in scientific journals, conferences, etc. Likewise using unproven subjective paranoid conspiracy & other belief theories is in contrast to objectively proving evidence beyond all reasonable doubt as in a Court of Law.
